name: NCR
startIntroPart1: Aradesh, the door of Vault 15 is opened, people are determined to enter the new world and only you can lead them in the bright future!
startIntroPart2: Will you protect them from raiders and any other dangers of the Wasteland?
declaringWar: The negotiations are over, from now on you are an enemy of our people!
attacked: Thoughtful actions are definitely not your strength.
defeated: I hope future generations will record this moment in history as a great tragedy.
introduction: Our people greet you and hope for your prudence.
neutralHello: What a good day on the Wasteland, isn't it?
hateHello: For you showing up to talk to me is a bad idea.
